name: ApocaZombies
description:
Background Story:

Zombies attacked your kingdom and infected its inhabitants, as a soldier, your duty is to keep peace in your kingdom, eliminate the enemies, and help the citizen.

How to play:

You're controlling a soldier with a rifle, trying to kill all the zombies and heal all the infected people.

Zombies have three phases, to eliminate them you should kill them three times, after each time you kill them they will wait for 5s and respawn.

To heal infected people you should take a medkit and then interact with them, the medkit will be consumed and the person will be healed.

Controls MovingWASDAimingRight mouse buttonShooting / InteractingLeft mouse button while aiming
